name: Firewall (mountaingoats)
description:
In Firewall, viruses/bugs are attacking your computer, it is your duty to take the fight to them and defend the vital components of your computer. The gameplay is a combination of 3rd person, action combat and tower defence genres. You can build towers and traps along the enemy’s movement path to help you impede or halt their progress. Alternatively, you can take the fight to them personally with your own weapon. 

This game was created in 6 weeks for a class project by a team of seven:
